description: [WhisperGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0689) can Base64 encode strings, store downloaded files in reverse byte order,  and use the Eazfuscator tool to obfuscate its third stage.(Citation: Cisco Ukraine Wipers January 2022)(Citation: Medium S2W WhisperGate January 2022)

external_references.description: Biasini, N. et al.. (2022, January 21). Ukraine Campaign Delivers Defacement and Wipers, in Continued Escalation. Retrieved March 14, 2022.
S2W. (2022, January 18). Analysis of Destructive Malware (WhisperGate) targeting Ukraine. Retrieved March 14, 2022.
